verbs.description: Trump [V: has] long been a critic of the deal , maintaining that Obama gave up too much for too little .
[ARG1: Trump] has [ARGM-TMP: long] [V: been] [ARG2: a critic of the deal] , [ARGM-ADV: maintaining that Obama gave up too much for too little] .
[ARG0: Trump] has long been a critic of the deal , [V: maintaining] [ARG1: that Obama gave up too much for too little] .
Trump has long been a critic of the deal , maintaining that [ARG0: Obama] [V: gave] up [ARG1: too much] [ARG3: for too little] .
